thread.title: Pennsylvania attorney general charged with 2nd perjury count
thread.title_full: Pennsylvania attorney general charged with 2nd perjury count

title: Pennsylvania attorney general charged with 2nd perjury count
locations: Montgomery County Office of the District Attorney
text: > Political Pennsylvania attorney general charged with 2nd perjury count In this copy of a document provided by the Montgomery County Office of the District Attorney on Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015, a secrecy oath signed shortly after taking office by Pennsylvania Attorney General Kathleen Kane in early 2013 is shown. Kane faces a new charge that stems from evidence found during an execution of a search warrant at her office Sept. 17. Kane was previously charged with perjury, conspiracy and other counts. Prosecutors say she leaked confidential information from a 2009 grand jury probe and then tried to cover it up. (Montgomery County Office of the District Attorney via AP)
